name: Daily Crypto Bollinger-RSI Mean Reversion
description: A conservative daily-timeframe mean-reversion system for BTC/USD and ETH/USD. It enters long when price is oversold below the lower Bollinger Band (20-SMA, 2-σ) and RSI(14)<30, and shorts when price is overbought above the upper Band and RSI(14)>70. Positions are sized to risk 2 % of equity with a 1.5 % stop-loss and 2.25 % fixed take-profit, while also monitoring exit rules that close at the middle Bollinger Band or RSI 45-55, whichever occurs first.
